LanguageData.CodeineHigh.stages.0.label: high on codeine
LanguageData.CodeineHigh.stages.0.description: Codeine is a great relief from physical and emotional pain.
LanguageData.CodeineWithdrawal.stages.1.label: codeine withdrawal
LanguageData.CodeineWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I'm cold yet sweating. I'm hurting all over and my heart is beating fast.
